name: 与姐姐同居别墅的日子
name_original: 与姐姐同居别墅的日子
description:
Introduction to the game

"The days of living in a villa with my sister" is a love cultivation game. Live in a luxury villa with young ladies and sisters, chat with them, understand their personality hobbies or favorite snacks? Trying to cultivate a good impression with them can carry out advanced interaction, such as helping her change clothes.

3 interactive little sisters

- "Mei cat sauce" has a strange character and likes sweet things. How to cultivate a good relationship with her? It's also a very expensive thing.
- "Hoshi" is unknown, or mysterious.
- "maid"'s gentle character is probably the best role to cultivate goodwill.
At present, only three interactive little sisters are set up. More wonderful contents will be updated slowly later. Don't miss it!
